control_categories.name: Organizational Controls
control_categories.description: Controls related to organizational security measures

controls.name: Policies for information security
controls.description: Information security policy and topic-specific policies shall be defined, approved by management, published, communicated to relevant personnel.

controls.name: Information security roles and responsibilities
controls.description: Information security roles and responsibilities shall be defined and allocated.

controls.name: Segregation of duties
controls.description: Conflicting duties and conflicting areas of responsibility shall be segregated.

controls.name: Management responsibilities
controls.description: Management shall require all personnel to apply information security in accordance with established policies.

controls.name: Contact with authorities
controls.description: The organization shall establish and maintain contact with relevant authorities.

controls.name: Contact with special interest groups
controls.description: The organization shall establish and maintain contact with special interest groups.

controls.name: Threat intelligence
controls.description: Information relating to information security threats shall be collected and analyzed.

controls.name: Information security in project management
controls.description: Information security shall be integrated into project management.

controls.name: Inventory of information and other associated assets
controls.description: An inventory of information and other associated assets shall be developed and maintained.

controls.name: Acceptable use of information and other associated assets
controls.description: Rules for acceptable use shall be identified, documented and implemented.

controls.name: Return of assets
controls.description: Personnel and other interested parties shall return all organizational assets upon change.

controls.name: Classification of information
controls.description: Information shall be classified according to information security needs.

controls.name: Labelling of information
controls.description: An appropriate set of procedures for information labelling shall be developed.

controls.name: Information transfer
controls.description: Information transfer rules, procedures, or agreements shall exist.

controls.name: Access control
controls.description: Rules to control physical and logical access shall be established.

controls.name: Identity management
controls.description: The full lifecycle of identities shall be managed.

controls.name: Authentication information
controls.description: Allocation and management of authentication information shall be controlled.

controls.name: Access rights
controls.description: Access rights shall be provisioned, reviewed, modified and removed.

controls.name: Information security in supplier relationships
controls.description: Processes and procedures shall be defined to manage security risks associated with suppliers.

controls.name: Addressing information security within supplier agreements
controls.description: Relevant security requirements shall be established with each supplier.

controls.name: Managing information security in the ICT supply chain
controls.description: Processes shall be defined to manage ICT supply chain security risks.

controls.name: Monitoring, review and change management of supplier services
controls.description: The organization shall monitor, review and manage changes to supplier services.

controls.name: Information security for use of cloud services
controls.description: Processes shall be established for acquisition, use, management and exit from cloud services.

controls.name: Information security incident management planning and preparation
controls.description: The organization shall plan and prepare for managing information security incidents.

controls.name: Assessment and decision on information security events
controls.description: The organization shall assess security events and decide if they are incidents.

controls.name: Response to information security incidents
controls.description: Information security incidents shall be responded to in accordance with procedures.

controls.name: Learning from information security incidents
controls.description: Knowledge gained from security incidents shall be used to strengthen controls.

controls.name: Collection of evidence
controls.description: The organization shall establish procedures for identification and collection of evidence.

controls.name: Information security during disruption
controls.description: The organization shall plan how to maintain security during disruption.

controls.name: ICT readiness for business continuity
controls.description: ICT readiness shall be planned, implemented, maintained and tested.

controls.name: Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements
controls.description: Legal, regulatory and contractual requirements shall be identified and documented.

controls.name: Intellectual property rights
controls.description: The organization shall implement procedures to protect intellectual property rights.

controls.name: Protection of records
controls.description: Records shall be protected from loss, destruction, falsification and unauthorized access.

controls.name: Privacy and protection of PII
controls.description: The organization shall identify requirements regarding PII protection.

controls.name: Independent review of information security
controls.description: The organization's approach to managing security shall be reviewed independently.

controls.name: Compliance with policies, rules and standards
controls.description: Compliance with security policies, rules and standards shall be regularly reviewed.

controls.name: Documented operating procedures
controls.description: Operating procedures for information processing facilities shall be documented.

controls.name: Screening
controls.description: Background verification checks shall be carried out on candidates.

controls.name: Terms and conditions of employment
controls.description: Employment contractual agreements shall state security responsibilities.

controls.name: Information security awareness, education and training
controls.description: Personnel shall receive appropriate security awareness training.

controls.name: Disciplinary process
controls.description: A disciplinary process shall be formalized for personnel who commit violations.

controls.name: Responsibilities after termination or change of employment
controls.description: Security responsibilities that remain valid after termination shall be defined.

controls.name: Confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements
controls.description: Confidentiality agreements shall be identified, documented and reviewed.

controls.name: Remote working
controls.description: Security measures shall be implemented when personnel are working remotely.

controls.name: Information security event reporting
controls.description: The organization shall provide a mechanism for personnel to report security events.

controls.name: Physical security perimeters
controls.description: Security perimeters shall be defined and used to protect areas.

controls.name: Physical entry
controls.description: Secure areas shall be protected by appropriate entry controls.

controls.name: Securing offices, rooms and facilities
controls.description: Physical security for offices, rooms and facilities shall be designed and implemented.

controls.name: Physical security monitoring
controls.description: Premises shall be continuously monitored for unauthorized access.

controls.name: Protecting against physical and environmental threats
controls.description: Protection against physical and environmental threats shall be designed.

controls.name: Working in secure areas
controls.description: Security measures for working in secure areas shall be designed.

controls.name: Clear desk and clear screen
controls.description: Clear desk rules and clear screen rules shall be defined and enforced.

controls.name: Equipment siting and protection
controls.description: Equipment shall be sited securely and protected.

controls.name: Security of assets off-premises
controls.description: Off-site assets shall be protected.

controls.name: Storage media
controls.description: Storage media shall be managed through their lifecycle.

controls.name: Supporting utilities
controls.description: Information processing facilities shall be protected from power failures.

controls.name: Cabling security
controls.description: Cables carrying power and data shall be protected from interception.

controls.name: Equipment maintenance
controls.description: Equipment shall be maintained correctly to ensure availability.

controls.name: Secure disposal or re-use of equipment
controls.description: Items of equipment containing storage media shall be verified to ensure data is removed.

controls.name: User endpoint devices
controls.description: Information stored on, processed by or accessible via user endpoint devices shall be protected.

controls.name: Privileged access rights
controls.description: The allocation and use of privileged access rights shall be restricted and managed.

controls.name: Information access restriction
controls.description: Access to information and other associated assets shall be restricted.

controls.name: Access to source code
controls.description: Read and write access to source code shall be appropriately managed.

controls.name: Secure authentication
controls.description: Secure authentication technologies shall be implemented based on access restrictions.

controls.name: Capacity management
controls.description: The use of resources shall be monitored and adjusted.

controls.name: Protection against malware
controls.description: Protection against malware shall be implemented and supported by user awareness.

controls.name: Management of technical vulnerabilities
controls.description: Information about technical vulnerabilities shall be obtained and evaluated.

controls.name: Configuration management
controls.description: Configurations shall be established, documented, implemented, monitored and reviewed.

controls.name: Information deletion
controls.description: Information stored in systems shall be deleted when no longer required.

controls.name: Data masking
controls.description: Data masking shall be used in accordance with access policy.

controls.name: Data leakage prevention
controls.description: Data leakage prevention measures shall be applied to systems and networks.

controls.name: Information backup
controls.description: Backup copies of information, software and systems shall be maintained.

controls.name: Redundancy of information processing facilities
controls.description: Information processing facilities shall be implemented with redundancy.

controls.name: Logging
controls.description: Logs that record activities, exceptions, faults and other events shall be produced.

controls.name: Monitoring activities
controls.description: Networks, systems and applications shall be monitored for anomalous behaviour.

controls.name: Clock synchronization
controls.description: The clocks of information processing systems shall be synchronized.

controls.name: Use of privileged utility programs
controls.description: The use of utility programs that can override system controls shall be restricted.

controls.name: Installation of software on operational systems
controls.description: Procedures shall be implemented to control installation of software.

controls.name: Networks security
controls.description: Networks and network devices shall be secured, managed and controlled.

controls.name: Security of network services
controls.description: Security mechanisms, service levels and requirements shall be identified.

controls.name: Segregation of networks
controls.description: Groups of information services, users and systems shall be segregated.

controls.name: Web filtering
controls.description: Access to external websites shall be managed to reduce exposure to malicious content.

controls.name: Use of cryptography
controls.description: Rules for effective use of cryptography shall be defined and implemented.

controls.name: Secure development life cycle
controls.description: Rules for secure development shall be established and applied.

controls.name: Application security requirements
controls.description: Security requirements shall be identified, specified and approved.

controls.name: Secure system architecture and engineering principles
controls.description: Principles for engineering secure systems shall be established and applied.

controls.name: Secure coding
controls.description: Secure coding principles shall be applied to software development.

controls.name: Security testing in development and acceptance
controls.description: Security testing processes shall be defined and implemented.

controls.name: Outsourced development
controls.description: The organization shall direct, monitor and review activities related to outsourced development.

controls.name: Separation of development, test and production environments
controls.description: Development, testing and production environments shall be separated.

controls.name: Change management
controls.description: Changes to information processing facilities and systems shall be subject to change management.

controls.name: Test information
controls.description: Test information shall be appropriately selected, protected and managed.

controls.name: Protection of information systems during audit testing
controls.description: Audit tests and activities involving production systems shall be planned.
